item.title: golang memo
item.description: tell you file and line number like C runtime.Caller(0) iterate over some field in structure package main import "fmt" import "reflect" import "strings" type MyStruct struct { A,B,C string I int D string J int } func main() { ms := MyStruct{"Green ", " Eggs", " and ", 2, " Ham ", 15} // Print it out now so we can see the difference fmt.Printf("%s%s%s%d%s%d\n", ms.
